BasicInfo.short: Cannuflow produces fluid management and access devices for arthroscopy and sports medicine procedures.

Products.name: SportPort
Products.description: SportPort is the first easy to use super flexible portal for arthroscopy

Products.name: TwoVu coaxial cannula
Products.description: TwoVu is the original coaxial outflow cannula for superior endoscopic vision in arthroscopy

Products.name: EntreVu instrument cannula with Extravastat technology
Products.description: EntreVu is the only instrument cannula clinically proven to defeat dangerous fluid extravasation in arthroscopy

Products.name: ClearVu Flexible Cannula
Products.description: The gold standard atraumatic outflow cannula for knee surgery

Products.name: Extravastopper
Products.description: Extravastopper is unique product from Cannuflow that keeps fluid IN the joint, OUT of the soft tissue and stops waste of expensive fluid
